title: How to solve vectors in physics - Quora

response.answer_text: Just go through your class 11 textbook or ncert and study the theory and try to understand the concept and learn the formulas. Now try solving problems. It might appear easy now once u are through with the concept. Vectors problem in physics are quite easy as compared to the one in maths. I also had queries in vector during class 11 but eventually it came to me.
I would suggest to Refer Vectors in Mathematics where in Number of examples on Vector operations will be practiced. Later it would be easy to solve Vector related problems in Physics.
Refer to any standard textbook of Physics of Std. 11 th OR You Tube video lectures on this topic.
